plot outline: An underworld Don wants to cast his mistress in a big budget film she comes to she comes to meet film director Mahesh in Panchagani whose more excited to direct the film as its financed by underworld.Mini a top star who has given many hits with Mahesh but he does not want to cast her anymore Mini threatens him to expose their secret relationship in return Mahesh threatens her to kill.Mini then threatens a young actor Suraj who refuses to work with her in re turn Suraj also threatens to kill her.Gambhir Singh Ex High Profile Policemen whose Minnie's father in law barges into her room asking her to return home and both threaten to kill each other.But Gambhir Singh spares Mini and she is killed the same night.
title: Chargesheet
plot: The story revolves around the murder case of an actress.

An underworld Don wants to cast his mistress in a big budget film she comes to she comes to meet film director Mahesh in Panchagani whose more excited to direct the film as its financed by underworld.Mini a top star who has given many hits with Mahesh but he does not want to cast her anymore Mini threatens him to expose their secret relationship in return Mahesh threatens her to kill.Mini then threatens a young actor Suraj who refuses to work with her in re turn Suraj also threatens to kill her.Gambhir Singh Ex High Profile Policemen whose Minnie's father in law barges into her room asking her to return home and both threaten to kill each other.But Gambhir Singh spares Mini and she is killed the same night.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
